Class DBFileBlockDAO

java.lang.Object
app.apollo.server.DBFileBlockDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileBlockDAO
public class DBFileBlockDAO extends Object implements FileBlockDAO
Implementation of FileBlockDAO that interacts with a SQL database to perform CRUD operations on file blocks.
